channel.title: Foxtopia Online 24/7/Has Tekkit Server/Normal Survival server
channel.description:
[B][CENTER][SIZE=4]Welcome.[/SIZE]
[COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Foxtopia server has been around for round about 2+ Years we havn't done much advertising over the years no idea why but now we are going to! Myself i have been playing the server since the server first ever start and i've seen overtime many player come and go and owners pass down foxtopia server to other players/owners [now] to host[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#008000"]Features:[/COLOR] [COLOR="#00FFFF"] - Tekkit Server/Survival (If you want more information about tekkit and its featurers read here:[/COLOR] [url=http://www.technicpack.net/tekkit/]http://www.technicpack.net/tekkit/[/url]) [COLOR="#008000"][COLOR="#00FFFF"] - Normal Server/Survival - 24/7 - 99.9 Uptime - Friendly staff - Nice players[/COLOR][/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FFD700"]For more information you can look around at our fourms which are Here: [/COLOR][url=http://foxtopia.dyndns.info/forum/index.php]http://foxtopia.dyndns.info/forum/index.php[/url] [COLOR="#FFD700"]And you can come see us on our irc channel which is right Here:[/COLOR] [url=http://www.esper.net/publicirc.php]http://www.esper.net/publicirc.php[/url] [COLOR="#FFA500"][COLOR="#FFD700"]The ID For the IRC Channel is [/COLOR][/COLOR][COLOR="#FFFFFF"]#foxtopia[/COLOR][COLOR="#FFD700"] And for our minecraft mulitplayer server IP is: [SIZE=5]foxtopia.me[/SIZE] [/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Thread is still under-construction[/COLOR][/CENTER][/B]

item.title: Foxtopia Online 24/7/Has Tekkit Server/Normal Survival server
item.dc:creator: @Elemental_God Elemental God
item.description:
@Elemental_God wrote:

[B][CENTER][SIZE=4]Welcome.[/SIZE]

[COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Foxtopia server has been around for round about 2+ Years we havn’t done much advertising over the years no idea why but now we are going to! Myself i have been playing the server since the server first ever start and i’ve seen overtime many player come and go and owners pass down foxtopia server to other players/owners [now] to host[/COLOR]

[COLOR="#008000"]Features:[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#00FFFF"]

  • Tekkit Server/Survival (If you want more information about tekkit and its featurers read here:[/COLOR] http://www.technicpack.net/tekkit/)
    [COLOR="#008000"][COLOR="#00FFFF"]
  • Normal Server/Survival
  • 24/7
  • 99.9 Uptime
  • Friendly staff
  • Nice players[/COLOR][/COLOR]

[COLOR="#FFD700"]For more information you can look around at our fourms which are
Here: [/COLOR]http://foxtopia.dyndns.info/forum/index.php
[COLOR="#FFD700"]And you can come see us on our irc channel which is right
Here:[/COLOR] http://www.esper.net/publicirc.php
[COLOR="#FFA500"][COLOR="#FFD700"]The ID For the IRC Channel is [/COLOR][/COLOR][COLOR="#FFFFFF"]#foxtopia[/COLOR][COLOR="#FFD700"]
And for our minecraft mulitplayer server IP is: [SIZE=5]foxtopia.me[/SIZE]
[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FF0000"]Thread is still under-construction[/COLOR][/CENTER][/B]
